strapiPost.title: Celebrate Cinco De Mayo At The Grand Opening Of Carmelitas Modern Mexican Cuisine
strapiPost.content:
Join the Cinco de Mayo festivities during Carmelitas' Grand Opening on May 5 at their new location in Springdale. Explore their new delicious modern Mexican cuisine menu while enjoying their relaxed dining atmosphere, dog-friendly patio, and live music!

  • Cali-flavors: Founded by Jeremy and Karla Putts, Carmelitas began as a catering company and quickly gained attention for its distinctive flavors inspired by San Diego roots, putting a modern spin on traditional Mexican and Californian street food classics. The restaurant will be open this week, Monday-Friday from 11a-2p, to serve their popular street food menu and from 5p-9p with a selection of elevated modern Mexican food. 
  • Fiesta: The Grand Opening celebration will begin with a ribbon-cutting ceremony at 10a before lunch. The party will start at 6p when the Rock en Espanol band Voltaje takes the stage.

Follow Carmelitas on Instagram for updates, events, and more HERE.
